column4: coz_, would you mind taking the chat about graphic cards to #ubuntu-offtopic?

ok, im not talking about that. i just wondered if anyone knew if the start or end of a hdd was faster. i just benchmarked and got min 34meg/s vs 72meg/s max and need every bit of speed i can on a 512meg ram p4. im partitioning now so im trying to proceed with the install. but if nobody knows.. i did try googling first but didnt get anywhere
i'm not talking about your benchmarking, that is a support question. However, you were also talking about the graphics card. I was only asking if you would take that subject to offtopic.
